name: Cholla
body:
### Welcome to Cholla.
Cholla is a new 3D hydro code created and maintained by Evan Schneider at the University of Arizona. Check back here for development updates.

### Authors and Contributors
Cholla was written by Evan Schneider (@evaneschneider) with additional contributions by Brant Robertson (@brantr).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
